评论概述: Returned due to bra straps showing.
评论详情: I ended up returning the stress simply because my bra straps are showing, so maybe I need to buy different bras or bras that connect in the back or something. However, the dress looked absolutely adorable on me and fit me so well. I may try to order a similar dress just maybe with a different cut to cover up my bra straps. I like that it was so stretchy, but yet my waist looked so snatched. Cute dress.

I absolutely loved it! The fabric is high-quality. I washed it before wearing it, and it didn’t lose its color or shape, which is a big plus. This dress exceeded my expectations! I highly recommend. I’m already planning to buy it in another color! The size is right I am M normally and bought M and fit perfectly.
Cute fit but long. Feels like it should be shorter to be proportional

This is my new favorite golf dress! The color is so flattering in the sun, the shorts underneath are vented and comfortable (they even have a pocket for balls) and the cut of the top is flattering. I would probably size up for more comfort, though; my small was true to size but slightly form fitting.

I love it. It fits well. The material keeps you all tight and in place. There are pockets in the shapewear which is interesting, they aren’t on the outside of the dress but underneath. It is awkward going to the bathroom and having to practically take the entire dress off. I know some shapewear companies are starting to have cut outs for easy access. Good quality. Would recommend

I got this super cute little sporty dress to wear at a music festival . I originally had planned to wear it with white cowboy boots and turquoise belt but it was day 3 and I was tired and my feet hurt so we made it sporty lol .. it was extremely comfortable! I ordered in both medium and large and found the large to be too big . So kept the medium! I am 5’5, 160lbs curvy build . I want this in other colors! It’s that good! Also, didn’t need to wear a bra with this! I am a 32g and felt supported the whole time! Highly recommend!
Easy to pack, comfortable and cute. It was a little low cut for me so I wore a tank under it.
Love this and it’s so comfy and flattering, true to size. Only “annoying” this is going to the bathroom having to take it all off but can’t wait to wear this in the summer

If you’re above six feet tall it may look like the photo, but otherwise this thing is long, clunky, wide and not at all as photographed.  I am fit and average height - 5’4” at 125 lbs/athletic build with probably 8-10 lbs to lose to be ideal weight. This dress looked absolutely frumpy on me, when this shape/cut is normally ideal for someone who has the ‘inverted triangle’ build with a bit of shoulder and hips. I like my bras, tanks and dresses to have that square-ish cut.  The quality of the materials was good, though, and the color was on point with the photo.

Very cute athletic dress that I got tons of compliments on at Disney. Love the built in shorts with pockets underneath. For fit I got a size small and for reference I am 5’3 and 125 pounds. No need to wear a bra with this dress either. Material is stretchy and comfortable. Red color was vibrant and came as pictured. Perfect length and fit, easy to get on and take off. Buy this dress!

评论概述: It's my smoothie for the day.
评论详情: I like it so much, I'm getting another.
I was literally stopped in the street for a link to this dress. So cute, so flattering. Seriously just buy it. I got another color I love it so much!

This dress is perfect for both athletic activities and casual outings. The square neckline and short sleeves give it a flattering and modern look, while the built-in shorts add functionality and comfort. The fabric is soft, breathable, and stretches just the right amount, making it great for sports like tennis or golf.  The addition of pockets is a thoughtful touch, offering convenience without compromising style. It fits true to size and feels great throughout the day. I highly recommend this dress for anyone looking for a blend of fashion and practicality!
I’m a size small in absolutely everything, often an XS and this was extremely tight. I ended up returning because it was not flattering or comfortable. I’m 5’2 and 110lbs.

The dress itself is awesome. The red color popped & the pockets were a nice touch. I wish I had purchased an XL instead of a L due to the top portion being snug. I am 5FT and 180, a bit top heavy in the chest & shoulder areas these days. Lastly, wait until your body is dry after a shower & lotioning before putting on the dress or you might have difficulty sliding it up. Happened to me!

I like this dress a lot! It’s extremely comfortable, easy to move around in and can be dressed up or down - especially with heels.  For reference, I’m 5’6 and a half, about 140 pounds with 35 inch waist and larger hips. Got a size Small  Reasons it’s not 5 stars - It is a little short for my liking. The built-in shorts help with that. I just think it would be more flattering and I’d wear it more often if the back had slightly more length. It feels almost too short to wear casually, like it looks more natural dressed up with heels. Would probably work better for slightly shorter girls  I also wish the waist was tighter. It’s not bad, but my favorite dresses have that area more fitted.

This is a super cute, quality fabric. Comfortable and size is perfect for my teenage daughter!

If I could give it 6 stars I would. Don’t consider it, GET IT. This dress is it!! I’m have a mommy body and let me tell you, I don’t need any shapewear or a bra to wear this dress. It is so form fitting and cute for any occasion. I need one in every color. I don’t even play tennis haha.

Ladies don’t walk to get this dress run!!!! I didn’t think this would be plus size friendly but it is and it’s so cute…I will be buying them in every color!!

I’m so mad I got this dress at the end of summer. They fit like a glove and hide a multitude of sins. I would have worn these all season! The color was true to what was on the website.
One of my favorite comfy fits !

Beautiful dress really compliments the body, Great fit and material.

For reference I’m 5’6 and about 164lbs. I chose a large. I didn’t want it super tight so I chose a size large and it fit perfect. The pockets on both sides underneath is amazing. I put my phone in the pockets. I want it in a bunch of other colors now, especially the red for Christmas 🎄❤️ buying it in multiple colors! 😍

Love this dress but I’m sad that after I washed it some of the seems came undone the material was so soft and thick plus it has a body suit under it and it has packets!!!!  I love it ….it is true to size I’m 5’2 240 I got an xl

评论概述: Didn't fit, but was super cute
评论详情: I'm 5'10" with broad shoulders (20" across) and a 41" chest. Unfortunately, the Large and XL didn't fit because of my broad shoulders. I'm still giving it five stars because the cut was really flattering, the material stretchy and thick, and the length was just right. If it wasn't for the tight fit around my arms and shoulders, I would have kept it. Even though the XL was tight in the chest, it would have still be doable even with a padded bra. I ordered a darker color and the light blue, and my bra lines were visible through the light blue but not the black. As with most tall people, empire cut dresses usually don't sit right, but this one wasn't bad. I wish it fit better, I would have gotten more colors :(
Fits awkwardly

Small fits more like a medium and isn’t form fitting. I’m 5’2 115lbs and small was lose on shoulders and bubbled around the waist. Great quality of fabric. Wish it fit better

Comfy, versatile. I usually wear a large and I sized up to an XL. I’m 5’1, 125lbs and the small fit perfect! It’s so comfortable and lightweight.

It’s true to size. Sexy and comfy. But it’s smells like someone’s armpits. Even after a wash.

I love this dress a lot! My onlyyyy issue with it is it’s way longer on me than I expected. It goes right above my knee. ( I’m 5’4) I ordered a medium. I may exchange it for a small and see if it fits more to my liking. But over all super cute and comfy dress! Can be casual or dressed up.

This dress was very flattering and comfortable! Its very flattering and the material is stretchy and comfy! The only downside was that white color was a tiny bit see through at the top and the whole dress needs to come off for the restroom. Other than that, it’s a great active dress!
Super comfy and looks great! I’m short and curvy (190lb and 5’3”) and got an XL it was a little loose in the chest though, so I would size down if you want a tighter fit.

评论概述: It’s very complimentary to any person
评论详情: This dress can fit anywhere from a person that’s 59 weighs 170 pounds to a person that’s 511 that weighs 170 pounds it complements anybody due to the style and the undergarment pulls you in and makes you look slender, The material is elastic and it makes you feel supported but it is very breathable it’s a great buy for the price the pocket underneath his nice if you want to put your drivers license and your credit card in there you can wear it anywhere from the Apple Orchard to a bar without changing

This is the cutest & most comfortable athletic dress I own. I’m very picky on my materials & the quality of fabric used in athletic styles and this dress is well made. The fabric & stitching is well done. The material itself is not too thick, it’s breathable. I am in between sizes- I’m a M/L depending on stretching of fabrics. I have an athletic build (powerlifter), weigh 170lbs; Hips 45”, Bust 32”, Waist 30”, Thighs 25”. This dress smooths & tightens in all the right places. I probably could’ve sized down for a tighter fit to a medium, but I like to be able to have some room in my outfits so I am happy ordering the L! When going to the bathroom you do have to pull it over your shoulders so if you are more broad there I would consider sizing up as to not wear & tear the stitching on the arm area from taking on/off. This dress does not have padding on the top. I don’t feel like it’s needed since it’s double lined but if you have more going on up top that’s something to consider.  If you’re debating ordering this dress just go ahead and order it. You won’t regret it!!
The material is stretchy, lightweight, and true to the original color online. It has built in shorts! Only downside is no built in bra, but that’s an easy fix.
It ran big for the fit that i wanted. I downsized and loved it !!!! Its perfect i downsized to a medium for a tight fit

The fit was very cute, but it came to me looking used, even though the tags were intact. I’m going to exchange for a darker color also because although the idea of the side pocket is nice, anything lighter than a dark brown or black would definitely show whatever is in the pocket.
Sexy fit. Long enough for my long torso. A pocket in each thigh!  Love the color. I am 5’7” 150#s & over 60
easy and classy dress to throw on. fits smaller in the waist and a little tighter in the chest. the square neck line is a little bit deeper than i imagined but overall super cute!

My new favorite. I wear it ALL THE TIME. even bought it in a long sleeve version. It’s slimming too which is awesome. Great for girls that are curvy and never have a great mini option. I wear it casual and on date nights. I always get looooks. Def recommend . You do have to get nakey to go potty- so that sucks. But oh well
THIS dress is adorable purchased this for a trip to Portugal and it looked so cute dressed up with a cute sandal and also with a pair of sneakers purchased multiple colors

This dress is great, very flattering and the fit is chefs kiss! The pockets are perfect for a phone or tennis ball but not much more. The shorts and bodice of the underneath are an almost mesh so it’s really breathable but not see through!!!
Se adapta a tu cuerpo muy bonito

It fits perfect and it’s not too tight and not see through. The material is perfect not to thick not to thin, and breathable. Love the pockets! Definitely a great value. I would order this dress again.

Fit, the shorts were too tight and kept riding up and the armpits were too tight as well. Everywhere fit great except for the sleeve area and shorts. It’s still cute and I’ll probably wear it on a day when I don’t care about it as much. I’m pretty skinny around my waist so there was plenty of room there. It’s just that I my arms and legs aren’t super skinny so it’s hard to find dresses or shirts that fit well there. hope this review helps.

Unfortunately this is another athletic dress that does not pass the bend over test for me. I love the trend but I need shorts under the dress that keep the *cheeks* in check, and this one does not. Other than that, the chest is a tad loose but the overall fit is nice. The lining is an athletic mesh material that is very comfortable. Will return bc the shorts turn into bikini coverage. But I found  that the coverage from the WENLIA dress is perfect!!
Love the dress

The way this material squishes you in and makes you feel so protected. Has shorts underneath which makes it a very comfy dress for any purpose. I used to it to party in so I was comfortable but looked nice too! Just bought another one in a different colour. Totally worth it.

I did not expect this to be as perfect as it is. The dress itself is stretchy but also tight enough that it sucks you in and holds you up in all the right places. The built in shorts are the perfect length so they don’t peek out of the bottom and I love that they have pockets!

So so cute. Pulls you in a bit. 5’7, 140 lbs. M for black. L for white. I bought in black and white and had to order a size up for white. The only tough part is it all has to come down when you go to the bathroom.

I’m 5’5, about 200 lbs, bra size 34FF, and I bought the XL. The top fits nicely and I don’t have to wear a bra with it which was a pleasant surprise. It’s snug and thick enough to make my waist look good but stretchy enough that I don’t feel like I’m being suffocated or trying to squeeze into it. It does show my belly a bit more than I usually like, but it’s smoothing so it’s not bad. I bought this for a costume, but I like it so much I will probably buy it in another color as well.
Very good quality and cute!

评论概述: Cute but Rode Up/Difficult to Take Off
评论详情: I bought this dress over the summer but wore it for the first time on Saturday. I wear a size 14 in pants so bought an XL dress in black. The dress fit well and looked nice but it rode up so much! I kept having to pull the skirt down so I didn't flash anyone. Maybe it was the way I walk or my specific body structure but I found the dress difficult to wear due to this issue.  Plus, going to the bathroom is difficult because there are no zippers or buttons on the dress and it has built-in shorts. I had to wiggle my arms out of the dress and then pull it down to use the bathroom. It wasn't impossible but it was inconvenient and time consuming.  The dress is very cute but it has some definite drawbacks so be prepared!
Orderd for my daughter. Was nervous about sizing but it's amazing. A true medium size. Plus is soft and stretchy.
Love this dress so much!!
I absolutely love this dress it’s better than Halara get it right now!
This dress fits true to size and holds everything in. It is very sturdy, double lined and has the perfect amount of stretch. The color is so flattering and the matierial isnt too think.
